title: System Integration, Testing, and Performance Optimization
description: Integrate all components, conduct comprehensive testing of the visualization system, optimize performance, and ensure the complete workflow produces high-quality educational topology visualizations.
expected_output: Fully integrated and tested system with: (1) Complete end-to-end functionality verification, (2) Performance optimization and benchmarking results, (3) Cross-platform compatibility testing, (4) Educational effectiveness validation, (5) Final deployment package with installation instructions, (6) Quality assurance report and recommendations for future improvements
